original_title: President inaugurates Clinical Training and Research Block at Jaffna Medical Faculty
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe today inaugurated the Clinical Training and Research Block at the Jaffna University’s Faculty of Medicine, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
Built at a cost of Rs. 942 million, this is the first new construction at the university in 46 years, according to the PMD.
